channel.title: Ordering a for each loop

item.title: Ordering a for each loop
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Is it possible to sort this by number of killStreak points that they have?

case 43797://Bounty
	int number = 0;
	for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
		player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
	}
	for(Player p5 : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) {
		if(p5 == null)
		     continue;
		number++;
		String titles = "";
		player.getActionSender().sendString("("+p5.getIndex()+")" + titles + ""+ p5.getDisplayName() + " Bounty: "+p5.killStreak+"M", 275, (16+number));
	}
	player.getActionSender().sendString("<u=000080>Bounties</u>",275,14);
	player.getActionSender().sendString("You have: Kills: "+player.KC+" Deaths: <col=FF0000>"+player.deathCount+"</col> KillStreak: <col=FF0000>"+player.killStreak+"</col> Bounty: <col=FF0000>"+player.killStreak+"M", 275, 16);
	player.getActionSender().sendString("Bounties", 275, 2);
	player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
	break;

Read full topic
